name: Automagnetic
description:
In this game you must keep your absentminded robot friend Bob safe, by picking up the Crates, Bullets, Enemies, and Bombs in his way, and moving them out aside using your magnet.

Controls:

Arrow keys and Space bar to control the magnet.

This game was created for the Minus Mechanic Jam. The goal was to create a game without Direct Attacking.
